question: If one performs a qadah of a fard salaat during makrooh salaat time, is the salaat valid or not? eg. If one performs Fajr qadah salaat during zawaal time.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

It is not permissible to discharge Qadhaa Salaat during Makrooh times. The
Qadhaa Salaat will not be valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
